smashy 0.0.0-9000
  • Reference

Convert to a Density Task

Source: R/DensityTask.R
as_task_density.Rd

Convert to a TaskDensity.

as_task_density(x, ...)

# S3 method for TaskDensity
as_task_density(x, clone = FALSE, ...)

# S3 method for data.frame
as_task_density(x, id = deparse1(substitute(x)), ...)

# S3 method for DataBackend
as_task_density(x, id = deparse1(substitute(x)), ...)

Arguments

x

(any)
Object to convert.

...

(any)
Additional arguments.

clone

(logical(1))'cr Whether to ensure the returned object is different from input x.

id

(character(1))
ID for the new Task. Defaults to the (deparsed) name of the expression given to x.

Value

TaskDensity

See also

Other density estimation classes: LearnerDensity, MeasureDensity, PredictionDensity, TaskDensity, as_prediction_density(), mlr_learners_density.featureless, mlr_learners_density.np, mlr_measures_density.logloss, mlr_tasks_faithful
